author: Laura Beck
title: The Back of Emma Watson's Latest 'Beauty and the Beast' Press Tour Dress Is So Weird and Great
text:
Win Type keyword(s) to search The Back of Emma Watson's Latest 'Beauty and the Beast' Press Tour Dress Is So Weird and Great 
This is a look. By Laura Beck Feb 20, 2017 Dreamy actress and activist Emma Watson turned up at the Beauty and the Beast photo call in Paris on Monday, and her look was a definite departure from Belle. It kinda looks like a wrap dress was attacked by a giant black rubber band, which means it's probably super expensive. (And since it's custom Louis Vuitton; you know that's true.) Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Getty Getty And check out the back â€” ka pow! The bottom belt looks exactly like my mom's fanny pack and I am digging it. Getty
